description.zh: 使用 distance() 创建一个以画布中心为圆心的遮罩区域。
description.en: Create a mask area centered on the canvas using distance().

zh: 理解`distance()`函数如何计算两点之间的距离。
学习如何将屏幕中心作为参考点来计算每个片元到中心的距离。
掌握使用距离和阈值（例如结合`step()`或`smoothstep()`）来创建圆形遮罩。
能够应用圆形遮罩来显示或隐藏特定区域的内容。
en: Understand how the `distance()` function calculates the distance between two points.
Learn how to use the screen center as a reference point to calculate the distance of each fragment to the center.
Master using distance and a threshold (e.g., combined with `step()` or `smoothstep()`) to create a circular mask.
Be able to apply a circular mask to show or hide content in specific areas.
